description: A React component implementing a login and registration page with password reset functionality, including form handling, validation, API calls, and UI state management.

methods.name: getNextAuthErrorMessage
methods.description: Maps error codes from NextAuth to user-friendly messages.

methods.name: handleLogin
methods.description: Handles user login, including validation, API call, error handling, and navigation.

methods.name: handleSignupStep1
methods.description: Validates signup form data for step 1 and proceeds to step 2.

methods.name: handleSignup
methods.description: Handles user registration, including validation, API call, error handling, and navigation.

methods.name: selectEmail
methods.description: Selects an email from saved emails for autofill.

methods.name: handleForgotPassword
methods.description: Sends a password reset email and manages UI state.

methods.name: handleResetPassword
methods.description: Resets password using provided token and new password, with validation and error handling.

methods.name: validatePassword
methods.description: Validates password strength based on length and character requirements.
